name: qr_code_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool go_qr_code_link_to_qrcode.
Tool description: Quickly and easily generate QR code images with our API. Simply provide a link address and our API will return a downloadable PNG image of the QR code. Perfect for use in print materials, on business cards, or in advertising campaigns
API description: Generates a QR code for a given URL using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code. Defaults to None.
